page.title: 11A FARM VISIT.
page.content: ON FRIDAY, JULY 8TH, I985 WE VISITED MANOR FARM. MR. BIRD HAS SHEEP AND CATTLE AND HE ALSO BREEDS RABBITS. THEY WERE BLACK AND WHITE RABBITS. THE OLDEST WAS ABOUT ONE YEAR OLD AND THE YOUNGEST WAS TWO WEEKS OLD. THEY ARE SOLD AT MARKET. AT THE MOMENT MR. BIRD HAS ABOUT IOO RABBITS. HE WOULD SELL THEM FOR ABOUT Â£2 EACH. RECENTLY THE FARMER HAS BOUGHT A NEW SHEEP DIP. IT IS FIBRE GLASS AND IS FOUR FEET DEEP AND SIX FEET WIDE. THE FARMER HAS TWO COLLIE DOGS TO HELP HIM ROUND UP THE SHEEP. THE SHEEP ARE DIPPED IN LINDANE AND MUST BE FULLY COVERED BY IT FOR ONE MINUTE. THE NEW SHEEP DIP HAS A SLIPPERY SURFACE SO THAT THE SHEEP SLIDE IN. MR. BIRD LOVES HIS WORK ON THE FARM BUT HATES DOING THE V.A.T.AND THE PEDIGREE RECORDS.
